EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudAA.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.9898.XLE Gamechanger (Refresh).Email 6 - Taking Open
EmailTemplate.subject: Taking OpenStack to large scale production
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Practical know-how based on industry experience Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
The phenomenal increase in OpenStack adoption proves its value for enterprises. Yet, one key issue is often encountered by large enterprises — driving large-scale cloud networks from OpenStack.
This TechTarget white paper discusses the challenges of managing large networks as part of an OpenStack private cloud. It also examines ways in which the challenges can be overcome with the right OpenStack configuration and complementary products. Download your free copy today! To learn more about Nokia IT solutions for large enterprises, visit our OpenStack <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/openstack]]> page.
Sincerely,
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia
U.S. and Canada: +1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
